scripts.test-docker-http: docker run  --rm -it -p 3001:3001 -e CONFIG_JSON=$(cat config-http.json) --name blue-green --hostname blue-green ghcr.io/yogendra/blue-green:${TAG:-latest}
scripts.test-docker-dns: docker run  --rm -it -p 3001:3001 -e CONFIG_JSON=$(cat config-dns.json) --name blue-green --hostname blue-green ghcr.io/yogendra/blue-green:${TAG:-latest}
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.release-patch: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-publish
